description: These garlic fries are easy and affordable to make. Just don't do it on valentines day or anniversary when kiss is necessary.
keywords: Finger food,Halal,Microwave,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Easy Garlic Fries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook fries in the oven according to packaging instruction.
Mince the garlic and mix it with olive oil, put in the microwave for 1 min then let it rest.
Shred parmesan and parsley mix it with lemon juice after. Add the sea salt last.
Drain the garlic from the oil, set aside oil for future cooking.
Toss all the ingredients together and enjoy.
